question:
Consider the following statements about the One IP- Two Dispensaries Scheme:
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Labour & Employment
  2. It facilitates the Insured Person (IP) to choose two dispensaries, one for self and another for family through an employer
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: One IP- Two Dispensaries Scheme is an initiative under the Ministry of Labour and Employment. Under One IP- Two Dispensaries scheme ESIC has given an option to an Insured Person (IP) to choose two dispensaries, one for self and another for family through an employer. This will benefit all IPs, especially migrant workers who are working in other than home State, while their families are living in their native States.
